name: WE:FX ミンナガFX
description:
SELL YOUR LIFE. YOUR LIFE IS NOT YOURSELF.

shoot monsters. earn currency.

get 1UP whenever you can.

clash to nest. transfer your life into their currency.

CLASH TO EXCHANGE. TRANSFER YOUR LIFE INTO FINAL SCORE.

time limit is 60 seconds.

get higher score as you can.

control

KEYBOARD

WASD, CURSOR = move

left SHIFT = fix direction

SPACE = shoot

ENTER = 1UP when you have enough currency

TAB = show how to play

ESC = quit

XINPUT GAMEPAD

LEFT STICK = move

LB = fix direction

A = shoot

B = 1UP when you have enough currency

RB = show how to play
